properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c2

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: They rode into town On the thirteenth of Spring. She have him her hand And he gave her his ring.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: She gave him her heart And he gave her his crown, But they never, no never Went down derry down derry down.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Her horse was pure white And his horse was gray She wanted to go But he asked her to stay.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Her eyes were pure black And his eyes were so blue. She wanted him strong And he wanted her true.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Come all ye fair maidens, And listen to me, If you want your young man To be strong and free

verse.name: c2
verse.lines: Just give him your heart And he'll give you his crown Just as long as you never Go down derry down derry down.
